review: Easy to set up. Just follow the TV screen prompt. Need computer or tablet to complete code verification.The Chromecast player is amazing. It receives my wifi signal well even when behind my TV. It runs a little warm but so far so good. I can stream video from various Apps from my ipod4,ipod5,tablet and Windows PC. Be sure to update or install the latest versions of Streaming Apps on your iOS and Android devices. For the desktop computer's Chrome browser, install the AddOn or Plugin to enable the Chromecast icon. Always play the video first before tapping or clicking the Chromecast square icon usually on the top right of the screen. The icon turns to blue color when video streaming is enabled. If I move the Chromecast device to another TV with HDMI jack, that TV will stream the video, if not, click the icon on the PC, tablet or mobile device to disconnect and click again to reconnect and it always worked for me.There is little control other than Pause/Play on the ipod, tablet or desktop computer. Some apps allows fast forwarding the movie if you pause the movie first. Works well with Netflix, Viki, Dramafever, Youtube so far.

author: ayojeera

review: I received my Chromecast for Christmas 2013, so I've had it for about four months now. In that time I have discovered an incredible amount of functionality, and like my title states, it almost seems like magic to me.It was super easy to set up, and it has allowed me to watch a wide variety of media. Services like Netflix, Youtube, BeyondPod, and Pandora work very well to play media streamed from the cloud. More recently, I have discovered the powers of Plex and casting from the Chrome browser itself to play some of the media I have stored locally.  Media looks sharp, and takes advantage of my TV's HD capabilities more than anything else I watch.It works well with my laptop, as old and underpowered as it is. It also works well with my off-brand Android phone, although at times, I do find that sometimes my phone loses communication with the Chromecast and I am unable to control the media that is streaming. In this case, I have to start broadcasting the media again to reestablish a connection, which can be annoying if I am in the middle of watching something.A note about television aspect ratios: my TV is pretty old (8 years) and is a 4:3 resolution, like TVs used to be. I have to change the input on my TV to accept 16:9 media, because the Chromecast itself cannot detect the proper aspect ratio and just stretches to fill the screen, regardless of dimension. I would imagine this would not be a problem on most modern televisions.Despite these two problems, the ease of use, the ability to play pretty much any media I can get my hands on, and the great appearance make this a wonderful device that I would recommend to anyone. The price is 100% worth it; go ahead and get one now!
author: Amanda

review: I gave this 4 instead of 5 stars because for some reason it doesn't work well with my 60" Sharp Aquos TV.
